original_text: And Abraham lifted up his eyes, and looked, and behold behind him a ram caught in a thicket by his horns: and Abraham went and took the ram, and offered him up for a burnt offering in the stead of his son.
korean_text: 아브라함이 눈을 들어 살펴본즉 한 숫양이 뒤에 있는데 뿔이 수풀에 걸려 있는지라 아브라함이 가서 그 숫양을 가져다가 아들을 대신하여 번제로 드렸더라

sentences.original_text: And Abraham lifted up his eyes
and behold behind him a ram
sentences.korean_translation: 그 뒤에 한 수양이 있는 것을 보았으니

sentences.original_text: caught in a thicket by his horns
and Abraham went and took the ram
and offered him up for a burnt offering
in the stead of his son
